basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Xin Jie, a final year business administration and computer science double degree student at NUS. I specialise in business analytics and software engineer and I'm keen to explore career opportunities in Software Engineering, Data Science, Data Analytics and Machine Learning. I run a small online business selling personalised gifts in my free time, and I also enjoy boxing!

projects.title: Detecting Depression using Twitter
projects.description: A school project where my team and I built a machine learning model to detect depression using Natural Language Processing by doing a sentiment analysis of tweets using Python.

projects.title: Final Year Project
projects.description: Final year project with Top International Holding where me and my teammates conceptualised and developed dashboards using Microsoft Power BI for business users to monitor their performance in a timely manner.

projects.title: NYGO
projects.description: NYGO is a R shiny application developed using R where tourists can obtain a range of information about New York City such as restaurant locations, lodging information and more. The restaurant and lodging information were scraped from Tripadvisor and Airbnb using webscraping techniques.

experience.company: National University of Singapore - School of Computing
experience.title: Research Intern
